name: Kaggle + FastAPI (GPU)
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; pip install -U pip; if [ -f "${containerWorkspaceFolder}/requirements.txt" ]; then pip install -r "${containerWorkspaceFolder}/requirements.txt"; fi; if [ -f "${containerWorkspaceFolder}/mcp_server/requirements.txt" ]; then pip install -r "${containerWorkspaceFolder}/mcp_server/requirements.txt"; fi; mkdir -p ~/.kaggle; if [ -n "${KAGGLE_JSON:-}" ]; then echo "$KAGGLE_JSON" > ~/.kaggle/kaggle.json && chmod 600 ~/.kaggle/kaggle.json; fi'
